snippet: Alain Vigneault, who will watch over his first official practice as coach Thursday, spoke promisingly of center Brad Richards, who struggled last season.
abstract: New York Rangers coach Alain Vigneault says he is looking forward to getting to know his club better and speaks promisingly of center Brad Richards, who had perhaps the most difficult season of any Ranger last season, culminating with a playoff benching during series against Boston Bruins.
lead_paragraph: Alain Vigneault, who will watch over his first official practice as coach Thursday, spoke promisingly of center Brad Richards, who struggled last season.
